Name: nOfAccFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Acceptance Check

Name: failCodeAccFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Acceptance

Name: pcktIdAccFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Acceptance Check

Name: nOfStartFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Start Action

Name: failCodeStartFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Start Check

Name: pcktIdStartFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Start Check

Name: nOfPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Progress Action

Name: failCodePrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Progress Check

Name: pcktIdPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Progress Action

Name: stepPrgrFailed
ShortDesc: Step identifier of last command which failed its Progress Check

Name: nOfTermFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands which have failed their Termination Action

Name: failCodeTermFailed
ShortDesc: Failure code of last command which failed its Termination

Name: pcktIdTermFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command which failed its Termination

Name: nOfReroutingFailed
ShortDesc: Number of commands for which re-routing failed

Name: pcktIdReroutingFailed
ShortDesc: Packet identifier of last command for which re-routing failed

Name: invDestRerouting
ShortDesc: Destination of last command for which re-routing failed

Name: failData
ShortDesc: Verification Failure Data (data item of fixed size but variable meaning)

Name: areYouAliveSrc
ShortDesc: Source of the latest (17,2) report received in response to a (17,1) command triggered by a (17,3) command

Name: areYouAliveTimeOut
ShortDesc: Time-out for the Are-You-Alive Test initiated in response to an On-Board Connection Test

Name: onBoardConnectDest
ShortDesc: Destination of the (17,1) triggered by a (17,3) command

Name: onBoardConnectDestLst
ShortDesc: Identifiers of target applications for an On-Board-Connection Test

Name: cycleCnt
ShortDesc: Cycle Counter for Reports in RDL

Name: sampleBufId
ShortDesc: Identifiers of Sampling Buffers
Remarks: The i-th element of this array is the identifier of the Sampling Buffer for the i-th Report Definition in the RDL

Name: debugVar
ShortDesc: Value of Debug Variables

Name: debugVarAddr
ShortDesc: Address of Debug Variables

Name: nOfDisabledEid
ShortDesc: Number of disabled event identifiers (one element for each severity level)

Name: nOfDetectedEvts
ShortDesc: Number of detected occurrences of events (one element for each severity level)

Name: nOfGenEvtRep
ShortDesc: Number of generated event reports (one element for each severity level)

Name: lastEvtEid
ShortDesc: Event identifier of the last generated level event report (one element for each severity level)

Name: lastEvtTime
ShortDesc: Time when last event report was generated (one element for each severity level)

Name: sid
ShortDesc: SIDs of report definitions in the RDL

Name: nOfDownlinks
ShortDesc: Number of on-going down-transfers

Name: nOfUplinks
ShortDesc: Number of on-going up-transfers

Name: lptSize
ShortDesc: Size of large packet in the LPT Buffer

Name: lptRemSize
ShortDesc: Remaining size of a large packet in the LPT Buffer (part of the large packet not yet down-transferred)

Name: lptSrc
ShortDesc: Source of the large packet up-transfer to the LPT Buffer

Name: lptTime
ShortDesc: Time when last up-transfer command to the LPT Buffer was received

Name: lptTimeOut
ShortDesc: Time-out for up-tramsfer to LPT Buffer

Name: maxRepDelay
ShortDesc: Maximum reporting delay

Name: repNmb
ShortDesc: Repetition number for the parameter monitor

Name: fMonEnbStatus
ShortDesc: Functional monitoring enable status

Name: parMonFuncEnbStatus
ShortDesc: Enable state of parameter monitoring function

Name: nmbAvailParMon
ShortDesc: Number of available parameter monitors in the PMDL

Name: nmbEnbParMon
ShortDesc: Number of enabled parameter monitors in the PMDL

Name: ctlTimeFirstEntry
ShortDesc: Time when first entry has been added to the CTL

Name: nmbAvailFMon
ShortDesc: Number of available functional monitors in the FMDL

Name: nmbEnbFMon
ShortDesc: Number of enabled functional monitors in the FMDL

Name: servUser
ShortDesc: Identifier of the application acting as user of the on-board monitoring service (source of most recent (12,15) command enabling monitoring function)
Remarks: The default user of the service is the ground.

Name: ctlRepDelay
ShortDesc: Maximum reporting delay for the CTL in multiples of MON\_PER

Name: period
ShortDesc: Periods of report definitions in the RDL

Name: isEnabled
ShortDesc: Enable status of report definitions in the RDL

Name: dest
ShortDesc: Destination of report definitions in the RDL

Name: lptDest
ShortDesc: Destination of transfer from LPT Buffer

Name: partSize
ShortDesc: Part size for transfers to/from LPT Buffer

Name: nOfAllocatedInRep
ShortDesc: Number of currently allocated InReports (i.e. successfully created by the InFactory and not yet released)

Name: nOfAllocatedInCmd
ShortDesc: Number of currently allocated InCommands (i.e. successfully created by the InFactory and not yet released)

Name: nOfAllocatedOutCmp
ShortDesc: Number of currently allocated OutComponents (i.e. successfully created by the OutFactory and not yet released)

Name: nOfFailedInRep
ShortDesc: Number of InReports whose creation by the InFactory failed

Name: nOfFailedInCmd
ShortDesc: Number of InCommands whose creation by the InFactory failed

Name: nOfFailedOutCmp
ShortDesc: Number of OutComponents whose creation by the OutFactory failed

Name: nOfTotAllocatedInRep
ShortDesc: Number of InReports successfully created by the InFactory since application start

Name: nOfTotAllocatedInCmd
ShortDesc: Number of InCommands successfully created by the InFactory since application start

Name: nOfTotAllocatedOutCmp
ShortDesc: Number of OutComponents successfully created by the InFac- tory since application start

Name: firstTba
ShortDesc: Identifier of next time-based activity due for release

Name: timeMargin
ShortDesc: Time margin for time-based scheduling service

Name: isTbsEnabled
ShortDesc: Enable status of time-based schedule

Name: nOfSubSched
ShortDesc: Number of non-empty sub-schedules

Name: nOfGroup
ShortDesc: Number of non-empty groups

Name: isGroupInUse
ShortDesc: InUse flag for time-based schedule group

Name: nOfTbaInSubSched
ShortDesc: Number of TBAs in sub-schedule

Name: nOfTba
ShortDesc: Number of currently defined time-based activities (TBAs)

Name: isSubSchedEnabled
ShortDesc: Enable status of a sub-schedule

Name: nOfTbaInGroup
ShortDesc: Number of TBAs in group

Name: isGroupEnabled
ShortDesc: Enabled flag for time-based schedule group

Name: failCode
ShortDesc: Verification Failure Code

Name: areYouAliveStart
ShortDesc: Time when the Are-You-Alive Test is started in response to an On-Board Connection Test

Name: nSimple
ShortDesc: Number of simply commutated data items in HK report in RDL

Name: dataItemId
ShortDesc: Identifier of the data item monitored by a Parameter Monitor (or zero if the Parameter Monitor is unused)

Name: monPrType
ShortDesc: Identifier of the Monitor Procedure type

Name: monPrRetVal
ShortDesc: Most recent return value of the Monitor Procedure

Name: monPrPrevRetVal
ShortDesc: Previous return value of the Monitor Procedure (or INVALID after the monitoring procedure or the monitoring function has been enabled)

Name: checkStatus
ShortDesc: Checking status of monitored parameter

Name: per
ShortDesc: Monitoring period for the parameter monitor

Name: perCnt
ShortDesc: Phase counter for the parameter monitor (integer in the range 0..(per-1))

Name: repCnt
ShortDesc: Repetition counter for the parameter monitor (integer in the range (0..(repNmb-1))

Name: lowerLimEvtId
ShortDesc: Identifier of event generated if the lower limit or the expect value is violated or zero if no event is generated

Name: valDataItemId
ShortDesc: Identifier of data item used for validity check of parameter monitor

Name: valMask
ShortDesc: Mask used for validity check of parameter monitor

Name: valExpValue
ShortDesc: Expected value for validity check of parameter monitor

Name: ctlDataItemId
ShortDesc: Identifier of the data item where the monitoring violation was detected

Name: ctlMonId
ShortDesc: Identifier of the Parameter Monitor which detected the violation

Name: ctlMonPrType
ShortDesc: Identifier of the type of the Monitor Procedure which detected the violation

Name: ctlExpValChkMask
ShortDesc: In the case of an Expected Value Monitor, the expected value check mask

Name: ctlCheckStatus
ShortDesc: Checking status which triggered the monitoring violation

Name: ctlPrevCheckStatus
ShortDesc: Checking status in the cycle before the monitoring violation was detected

Name: ctlParVal
ShortDesc: The parameter value which triggered the violation

Name: ctlParValLimit
ShortDesc: The parameter value limit whose violation triggered the violation

Name: lowerLim
ShortDesc: Lower limit for Limit Check Procedure

Name: upperLim
ShortDesc: Upper llimit for Limit Check Procedure

Name: expValue
ShortDesc: Expected value for Expected Value Procedure associated to Parameter Monitor

Name: parMonEnbStatus
ShortDesc: Parameter monitor enable status

Name: dummy32Bit
ShortDesc: Dummy item used for testing

Name: dummy16Bit
ShortDesc: Dummy item used for testing

Name: dummy8Bit
ShortDesc: Dummy item used for testing

Name: upperLimEvtId
ShortDesc: Identifier of event generated if the upper limit is violated or zero if no event is generated

Name: expValueMask
ShortDesc: Mask applied to monitored value before comparing it to its expected value in the Expected Value Procedure associated to Parameter Monitor
